pull.title: github-merge: Coalesce git fetches
pull.body: Fetch the destination branch as well as PR in one go. Saves a few seconds (as well as one ssh authentication, when using a yubikey) when using github-merge.py.

repo.name: bitcoin
repo.description: Laanwj's Bitcoin Core fork - see README.md on "readme" branch

events.message:
github-merge: Coalesce git fetches

Fetch the destination branch as well as PR in one go. Saves a few
seconds (as well as one ssh authentication, when using a yubikey) when
using github-merge.py.
